001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidTypeFunctionException;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
006
007import java.net.URI;
008
009import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
010
011public interface IDocumentBasedNodeItem extends INodeItem {
012
013  @Override
014  default IModelNodeItem<?, ?> getParentContentNodeItem() {
015    // there is no parent
016    return null;
017  }
018
019  /**
020   * Get the URI associated with this document.
021   *
022   * @return the document's URI or {@code null} if unavailable
023   */
024  @Nullable
025  URI getDocumentUri();
026
027  @Override
028  default URI getBaseUri() {
029    return getDocumentUri();
030  }
031
032  @Override
033  default INodeItem getParentNodeItem() {
034    // there is no parent
035    return null;
036  }
037
038  @Override
039  default IAnyAtomicItem toAtomicItem() {
040    throw new InvalidTypeFunctionException(InvalidTypeFunctionException.DATA_ITEM_IS_FUNCTION, this);
041  }
042}
